statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_consensus_history WHERE consensus_id = 1;
SELECT consensus_id, change_timestamp FROM blockchain_consensus_history;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_consensus_history WHERE change_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_consensus_history WHERE consensus_algorithm = 'Proof of Work';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_consensus_history WHERE next_algorithm = 'Proof of Stake';

SELECT consensus_id, next_algorithm FROM blockchain_consensus_history WHERE change_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT MAX(event_timestamp) FROM audit_log;

SELECT log_id, event_timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'

SELECT id, COUNT(*) AS change_count FROM blockchain_history GROUP BY id
SELECT * FROM blockchain_history WHERE algorithm LIKE 'SHA%'
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE description ILIKE '%error%'
SELECT id, algorithm, change_date FROM blockchain_history ORDER BY change_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM audit_log
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM blockchain_history
SELECT algorithm, COUNT(*) AS count FROM blockchain_history GROUP BY algorithm HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM blockchain_history WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT algorithm, MAX(id) AS max_id FROM blockchain_history GROUP BY algorithm
SELECT * FROM blockchain_history WHERE algorithm IN ('SHA-256', 'SHA-512')
SELECT id, algorithm, change_date FROM blockchain_history WHERE algorithm = 'SHA-256' OR algorithm = 'SHA-512'
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM audit_log WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00')
SELECT id, algorithm, change_date FROM blockchain_history LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10
SELECT id, algorithm, change_date FROM blockchain_history WHERE id = 1 UNION SELECT log_id AS id, description AS algorithm, event_timestamp AS change_date FROM audit_log WHERE log_id = 1
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE description IS NULL

SELECT block_id, algorithm_name FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes WHERE from_version IS NOT NULL;

SELECT * FROM block_transactions ORDER BY block_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes;
SELECT block_id, algorithm_name FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes WHERE from_version IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes WHERE algorithm_name = 'Proof of Stake';
SELECT block_id, to_version FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes WHERE algorithm_name = 'Proof of Work';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes;
SELECT block_id, from_version, to_version FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT event_timestamp, event_description FROM audit_trail WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, event_description FROM audit_trail WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_trail ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, transaction_data FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 100;
SELECT block_id, algorithm_name, from_version, to_version FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes WHERE block_id NOT IN (SELECT block_id FROM block_transactions);
SELECT block_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM block_transactions GROUP BY block_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes BC JOIN block_transactions BT ON BC.block_id = BT.block_id;
SELECT algorithm_name, COUNT(*) AS change_count FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes GROUP BY algorithm_name ORDER BY change_count DESC;
SELECT algorithm_name, to_version, COUNT(*) AS change_count FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes GROUP BY algorithm_name, to_version;
SELECT algorithm_name, MIN(block_id) AS first_change_id, MAX(block_id) AS last_change_id FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes GROUP BY algorithm_name;
SELECT block_id, algorithm_name, event_timestamp FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes BC JOIN audit_trail AT ON BC.block_id = AT.event_id;
SELECT AVG(block_id) AS avg_block_id FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes;
SELECT algorithm_name, SUM(block_id) AS total_block_id FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes GROUP BY algorithm_name;
SELECT algorithm_name, COUNT(*) AS total_changes FROM blockchain_consesus_algorithm_changes GROUP BY algorithm_name HAVING total_changes > 1;

SELECT id, algorithm_name FROM blockchain_consensus_algorithm_changes;

SELECT algorithm_name, change_date FROM blockchain_consensus_algorithm_changes WHERE algorithm_name ILIKE '%consensus%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_nodes, node_type FROM blockchain_nodes GROUP BY node_type;
SELECT node_id, MIN(activation_date) AS first_activation_date FROM blockchain_consensus_history GROUP BY node_id;
SELECT node_name, ip_address FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_type = 'full' AND ip_address NOT LIKE '%.1%';
SELECT AVG(AVG(change_date)) FROM blockchain_consensus_algorithm_changes GROUP BY algorithm_name;
SELECT log_id, action_type, action_timestamp FROM blockchain_audit_log ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm_history;

SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM consensus_block WHERE algorithm_id = 1;

SELECT validator_id, validator_name FROM validator WHERE validator_name LIKE 'Alice%';
SELECT * FROM validator_history ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT block_id, validator_id FROM block_validator WHERE block_id = 100;
SELECT block_id, validator_id FROM block_validator WHERE validator_id = 50;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm_history WHERE change_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT validator_id, validator_name FROM validator WHERE public_key = 'xyz456';
SELECT * FROM validator_history WHERE change_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM consensus_block WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm_history WHERE algorithm_name = 'PoW';
SELECT validator_id, validator_name FROM validator WHERE validator_name LIKE '%Bob%';
SELECT block_id, validator_id FROM block_validator WHERE validator_id = 10;
SELECT block_id, block_hash FROM consensus_block WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';

SELECT block_id, validator_id FROM block_validator WHERE block_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm_history WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT history_id, change_description FROM validator_history WHERE change_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm_history WHERE algorithm_name LIKE 'Proof%'
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM consensus_block WHERE algorithm_id = 1
SELECT validator_name, public_key FROM validator WHERE validator_id IN (SELECT validator_id FROM validator_history WHERE change_date > '2021-01-01')

SELECT block_id, block_hash, validator_name FROM consensus_block INNER JOIN block_validator ON consensus_block.block_id = block_validator.block_id INNER JOIN validator ON validator.validator_id = block_validator.validator_id
SELECT DISTINCT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM consensus_block ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT algorithm_name, change_date FROM consensus_algorithm_history WHERE id IN (SELECT algorithm_id FROM consensus_block WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01')
SELECT validator_name, change_date FROM validator INNER JOIN validator_history ON validator.validator_id = validator_history.validator_id WHERE validator_name LIKE 'Alice%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM validator
SELECT AVG(timestamp) FROM consensus_block
SELECT MAX(change_date) FROM validator_history
SELECT algorithm_name, MAX(timestamp) FROM consensus_block INNER JOIN consensus_algorithm_history ON consensus_block.algorithm_id = consensus_algorithm_history.id GROUP BY algorithm_name
SELECT validator_id, COUNT(block_id) as blocks_verified FROM block_validator GROUP BY validator_id HAVING COUNT(block_id) > 10
SELECT block_id, COUNT(validator_id) as validators_verified FROM block_validator GROUP BY block_id HAVING COUNT(validator_id) < 5
SELECT algorithm_name, COUNT(*) as block_count FROM consensus_algorithm_history INNER JOIN consensus_block ON consensus_algorithm_history.id = consensus_block.algorithm_id GROUP BY algorithm_name
SELECT validator_id, SUM(block_id) as total_blocks_verified FROM block_validator GROUP BY validator_id
SELECT block_id, MIN(timestamp) as earliest_timestamp FROM consensus_block GROUP BY block_id

SELECT algorithm_name, AVG(timestamp) as avg_timestamp FROM consensus_block INNER JOIN consensus_algorithm_history ON consensus_block.algorithm_id = consensus_algorithm_history.id GROUP BY algorithm_name
SELECT validator_name, MAX(change_date) as latest_change FROM validator INNER JOIN validator_history ON validator.validator_id = validator_history.validator_id GROUP BY validator_name
SELECT block_id, block_hash, change_date FROM consensus_block INNER JOIN validator_history ON consensus_block.block_id = validator_history.validator_id ORDER BY change_date DESC
SELECT * FROM consensus_block UNION SELECT * FROM consensus_algorithm_history
SELECT DISTINCT validator_id, validator_name, public_key FROM validator

SELECT algorithm_name, COUNT(*) as block_count FROM consensus_algorithm_history INNER JOIN consensus_block ON consensus_algorithm_history.id = consensus_block.algorithm_id GROUP BY algorithm_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
